name: test_e2e_with_logs[522_HRS_ENCHOST_001]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HRS_ENCHOST_001` |
| **Name** | Encoded Hyphen X-Forwarded-Host |
| **Category** | HTTP_SMUGGLING |
| **Subcategory** | obfuscation |
